short_summary: The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) wants to acquire a wire EDM cutting machine with all the components necessary for its proper operation.
description: The wire EDM does not generate heat, stress or mechanical deformation during the cutting process, preserving the integrity of the material microstructure and does not produce artifacts, which could appear in tensile test results. This device will also help the NRC meet the growing need to manufacture tools for its aluminum shaping operations.
full_summary:
**Notice Title**

Wire Electrical Discharge Machining (EDM) Cutting Machine
=============================================

**Contract Reference Number**

CB 8604-56036177

**Notice Status**

Expired

**Notice Details**

* **Publication Date**: August 31, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 22, 2023, 10:40 a.m. (Eastern Daylight Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: October 16, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024

**Contract Description**

The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) is seeking a reliable Wire EDM cutting machine to support its research and development activities. The machine will be used to produce samples with accurate dimensions and geometric characteristics, ensuring the preservation of material integrity and microstructure.

The NRC's Saguenay site requires a high-precision cutting tool to meet its increasing needs for manufacturing tools for aluminum shaping operations.

**Contract Requirements**

The successful bidder will be required to provide the following:

* A Wire EDM cutting machine with all necessary components for proper operation
* Proof of satisfactory experience with similar equipment
* A detailed description of the machine's capabilities, technical specifications, and operating procedures
* A quote for the machine's purchase price, including all accessory equipment and installation costs

**Trade Agreements**

This contract is subject to various trade agreements, including:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity**

* Quebec (except National Capital Region)

**Regions of Delivery**

* Quebec (except National Capital Region)

**Contact Information**

* Name: Kacendra Dion
* Email: [Kacendra.Dion@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:Kacendra.Dion@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (438) 324-8125
